snippet: RUDICK--Dr. Jack, 82 years old, died peacefully at home on March 20, 2016. Esteemed and caring surgeon for over 45 years. Devoted husband of Irene. Beloved father of Anne Rudick-Lowe, Vivien Kronengold, and Mark Rudick. Proud grandfather of Dylan, Madison, Aidan, Samantha, and Natalie. At his request, a private family gathering was held in his memory. Contributions may be made in his honor to the American Surgical Association Foundation at: http://americansurgical.org/ foundation.cgi. 1/3
